description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Forgotten Isles. Impressions of travel in the Balearic Isles, Corsica, and Sardinia. Rendered into English by F. Breton. With ... illustrations by the author" Author: VUILLIER, Gaston. Contributor: BRETON, Frederic. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10106.i.27." Page: 399 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1896 Publisher: Hutchinson & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003821060 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
